seo.description: Projects developed as a Full Stack developer using MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Nodejs), and other technologies like MySQL, Firebase, Nextjs, etc.

content.title: Projects
content.text: These are the main projects I've developed using both Frontend and Backend technologies. Some of the technologies used includes JavaScript, React, MongoDB, Express, MaterialUI, MySQL, Mongoose y Nodejs. There are some projects developed in groups while I was doing the FullStack MERN Mindhub's Bootcamp and others developed individually (bootcamp's tasks, technical test developments and personal projects).
